body.value:
I. Sample Meeting Agenda (Prepare to have between 2-3 hours to efficiently carrying out a successful workshop.) * Welcome and Update - 15 mins * Short Presentation - 15 to 30 mins (optional) * Divide into different stations to work on different tasks - one hour * Feedback and Clean up - 15 mins.
It is recommended to divide the work area into different stations based on laptop's condition.
Station 1: Laptop cleaning
Preparation before the meeting: Cleaning kit (some soft clothes, a small bottle of 91% alcohol, a box of cotton swabs)
Work Description: 1. Briefly introduce the Labdoo Flow ( http://www.labdoo.org/content/about-labdoo ) 2. Inspect the laptops and check to see if the laptop is tagged. 3. If it is tagged with a Labdoo ID number, send the laptop to the Installation Team , otherwise, send it to Tagging Team .
Station 2. Tagging laptops
Preparation before the meeting: Blank Labdoo Labels (you can find the link HERE ), scissors, clear tape, pens
Work Description: 1. Follow the Laptop Tagging procedure to tag the laptop. 2. Make sure both power adaptor and laptop are tagged with the same number.
Station 3. Installation
Preparation before the meeting: Most up-to-date official release Lubuntu CDs and USBs
Work Description: 1.Follow the Sanitation Guide: Simple Method (you can find the link HERE ) to install Lubuntu 2. If the laptop fails to be installed, send it to Team 4 for further investigation.
Station 4: Laptop Repair
Preparation before the meeting: 1. Most up-to-date official release Lubuntu CDs and USBs 2. Refer to https://www.labdoo.org/content/basic-tools-laptop-repair for repair tools.
Work Description: 1. Debug and fix the problems 2. If the laptop cannot be fixed, save its power adaptor, hard drive and memory as spare parts.
